description:
Driver for DisplayLink USB graphics chipsets incorporated in your dock, adapter or monitor


DisplayLink software release 11.6 delivers:
- New features for DL-7xxx series
- General stability updates and bug fixes

C1. Issues Fixed Since 11.5 M0 Release (11.5.5551.0)
Issues Fixed in 11.6 M0 Release (11.6.7168.0)
----------------------------------------------------
- DL-7xxx: Display drops to 640x480 resolution if connected via DP to HDMI active adapter. (VIFR-5406)

Issues Fixed in 11.5 M3 Release (11.5.6380.0)
----------------------------------------------------
- DL-1xx: Monitor keeps reconnecting with R11.5M1/2 software. (VIFR-5564, VIFR-5497, VIFR-5576)
- Mouse cursor lags and monitor blinks when machine is under heavy load. (VIFR-5310)
- Log file destination folder created only when necessary. (VIFR-5157)
- HotDeskingService may crash when Automatic wired/wireless MAC address cloning is enabled. (VIFR-5516)

Issues Fixed in 11.5 M2 Release (11.5.6200.0)
----------------------------------------------------
- MAC Address Pass-Through (MAPT) doesn't work on ARM64 PCs. (VIFR-5174)

Issues Fixed in 11.5 M1 Release (11.5.5963.0)
----------------------------------------------------
- DL-41xx: Blank display for 6 seconds after PC resume from sleep mode. (VIFR-5115)
- DL-7xxx: Splash screen remains on a screen after PC reboot. (VIFR-5185)
- DL-7xxx: LAN speed may drop occasionally from 2.5G to 100M. (VIFR-5048)
- DisplayLink driver could crash on USB unplug. (VIFR-5089)

Issues Fixed in 11.5 M0 Release (11.5.5551.0)
----------------------------------------------------
- DL-7xxx: LG 34WK95UP monitor was not working properly on DisplayPort. (VIFR-5046)
- DL-7xxx: Improved interoperability with DisplayPort monitors at 4K 144 Hz. (VIFR-4803)
- DL-7xxx: Failed to get EDID from some HDMI monitors. (VIFR-4762)
- DL-7xxx: 4K HDMI monitors appear at 30 Hz by default. (VIFR-4712)
- DL-7xxx: MAC Address Pass-Through (MAPT) is now working properly. (VIFR-5049)
